channel.title: These Days
channel.copyright: © Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved

description.p: Join three friends, Ilyaas, Zach and Awande, as they pick apart culture, politics and the latest happenings in human society.
Sometimes they all agree, most of the time they don’t.

channel.itunes:subtitle: Let's talk about whats going on - These Days
channel.itunes:author: Ilyaas, Zach and Awande | Solid Gold Studios

Join three friends, Ilyaas, Zach and Awande, as they pick apart culture, politics and the latest happenings in human society.

item.itunes:author: Ilyaas, Zach and Awande | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Raised from the dead (Pilot) | Ilyaas, Zach and Awande
item.itunes:title: Raised from the dead (Pilot) | Ilyaas, Zach and Awande
item.itunes:subtitle: And God said: let them rise from the dead and perform miracles
item.description:
In this episode, Ilyaas, Zach and Awande discuss the fanatical rise of evangelical pastors across South Africa while dissecting religion, law and social order.


The infamous “doom” pastor is now embroiled in another scandal-feeding his congregants dog meat. Source: 702 click here

Pastor Alph Lukau’s “miracle” seems to have been debunked. Source: TimesLive click here



Find out more about making your own podcast at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode, Ilyaas, Zach and Awande discuss the fanatical rise of evangelical pastors across South Africa while dissecting religion, law and social order.
